entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The Headmaster of Hogwarts School. He is rarely seen at meals and is thought to be leaving the school for days at a time.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts School, who is receiving private lessons from Dumbledore. He is concerned about Dumbledore's absence and feels abandoned.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts School, who shares Harry's concerns about Dumbledore's absence.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is giving private lessons to Harry, which are leading up to something related to the prophecy.
The trip to Hogsmeade is a location where Dumbledore is not present, but Harry and his friends are going.
